captions.text: [MUSIC]
[SOUND].
Welcome everyone.
My name's Ali A.

Today I've got big
Call Of Duty Advance Warfare information.

Additional prestiges, ways to earn
elite weapons, this is big, big news.
I've been in London all day.

It's currently 2:00 A.M., but I'm back
home recording this video for you guys, so

let's bring you guys this information and
jump into it.

We've got this awesome image,
which is gonna give us a ton

of information on what is going on,
so today's Sledge Hammer Games,

the guy's making Call of Duty Advanced
Warfare have listened to you guys.

The guys playing the game have
added in a ton of additional stuff.

So of course within Advanced Warfare
you have the standard 15 prestiges

with the final 15th prestige
max rank being master prestige.

And they've added in
an additional 15 prestige.

I mean there's 30 in total
in Advanced Warfare.
Which is a lot.

With the final rank now
being Grand Master Prestige.

You can see the gold versions,
all the prestiges here.

So once you meet,
reach the max rank Master Prestige,

you can continue to Prestige if you so
wish.

And go through all of these
additional Master Prestiges.

Now, when you actually go through and
Prestige you will not lose

any of your camo or challenge
progressions or any of your unlocks.

So this is literally just like bonus
Prestiges where there's almost no negative
side effects.

Of course from the fact of having to
actually rank up throughout that Prestige

to get access to the different
weapons at different levels.

And once you get those weapons, you'll be
able to use all of your attachments and

good stuff that we're used to having,
which is a great, great bonus.

But why do you want to Prestige
an additional 15 times, 30 times in total?

What's, what's like
the great thing behind it?
So.

When you actually reach
the final Grand Master Prestige,

you will get this crazy awesome
purple actual exo suit and

camouflage for your character that
we've seen before in the past.

And this is how you're going to
get it is absolutely insane,
and it looks ridiculous.

Like, you're gonna stand
out if you're using this.

Everyone's going to know that you're
a beast and you played the game a lot.

And you're not going to see too
many people with it at all.
Now, that's fantastic.
We've seen that before.

The additional prestiges are very,
very cool,

but what is this whole being able
to earn elite weapons about.
Now this is very interesting so.

Each additional
Master Prestige you complete,

you will be given a specific
elite weapon straight up.

Just literally straight up,
here you go, have this elite weapon.
So if you have a look on screen here,

you can see you are going to start off
with the obsidian steed, an extremely good

elite weapon to be giving someone
that's just hit Master Prestige One.

I think personally, that should be put
towards the end of this 15 Prestige list,
but, there you go.
This is what the order is at the moment.

Next up, at Master Prestige 2, you have
the MP11 Goliath, I really, really want,

then you have a MORS Silver Bullet,
Tac19 Sledgehammer, which is a shot gun,

EM1 Polar Vortex, I love the EM1, I'd
love, like to get that weapon for sure.

[MUSIC]
ARX160 Steel Bite.

I found this weapon, and used it
a ton when the game first came out.

You guys know that is
an absolutely beastily version.
The AMR9 Pro Pipe.
I don't think that's too good.

I think,
I know it has a noob tube attached to it.

But I think it's not
the best elite in the world.
Next up, we've got the Ameli Whale Horn.

You've then got the AE4 Gigawatt,
which I definitely want.

That's a beast.
[MUSIC]
Beast DOC Elite version.

I guess we don't actually
have the DOC gun unlocked so
then we won't get access to it.
So, it's worth getting a hold of, I guess.

You then have the IMR Thunder Tusk,
the SN6 Money.

I've done a video on that
covering this elite weapon.

Not the greatest in the world again,
but it looks pretty cool.
The ASM1 Speakeasy, a very, very good gun.

A lot of fans,
a lot of you guys love that weapon.

Then the Pytaek Loophole,
the HBRA3 Bear Fist.

And then finally the ASM1-Strider which
means technically you can get both ASM1

elite weapons through this Master Prestige
process which is very, very interesting.

So these are the weapons you can get
hold of and literally be given for
going through these additional Prestiges.
Now.

Kind of sucks this is the first
ever Call of Duty game

where I've decided to actually stay at
level 50 which is Max rank Zero prestige.

So I will not be able to
get all of these free guns.
But hopefully you guys can.
I'm going to be missing out unfortunately.

I'm still going to have to be grinding
away at those supply drops and

hoping that I can get
myself an elite weapon.

I did suggest when we found out that
you can be getting yourself elites that

there would be some sort of system
to actually progressively unlock

a weapon through doing
very hard challenges.

I still think that would
be a really good idea.

We'll have to see if
anything happens of that.

And on top of that, if you guys
remember the first time we found out

about the ability to get elite weapons
through some sort of earning system.

Michael Condray over at
Sledge Hammer actually tweets me.

When I tweeted out
an image of the AK12-RIP.
[SOUND] But that's not on this list.

So either they had it on this list and
decided to take it out or maybe there

is gonna be another way of earning elite
weapons that hasn't been announced yet.

I'm not sure.
Just something I picked up on or

something you guys picked up on and Tweet
me about a little bit was the fact that

that was how we found out
about the system, but

the gun isn't available to unlock through
any of these Master Prestiges but.
There we go, guys.

A ton of new stuff coming
to Advanced Warfare.

Are you going to be taking advantage
of these additional Prestiges or
is it going to be a bit too much?
Are you excited?

Do you think it's a good idea that you can
get a hold of all of these elite weapons
through this system.
Let me know down below.

Hopefully you guys really
enjoyed this video.
If you haven't seen it.

Yesterday I've got a awesome, awesome
gift from a fan which is so, so cool.

I definitely recommend you guys go and
check it out.

I'll link it on screen now so
I hope you guys had a fantastic weekend.

I'm gonna grab some sleep and
get this video up for you guys and

I'll see you tomorrow
with a brand new video.

title: "15 NEW prestiges & ELITE GUNS!" - Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare
